blood_spray.name: Blood Spray
blood_spray.description: Increases Physical Critical Chance by 8%. Critical Strikes leech 5% health and there is a 25 chance to spaen a Blood Orb when killing a target affected by Leech.

chaos_kindling.name: Chaos Kindling
chaos_kindling.description: Increases Spell Cooldown Rate by 7%. Ignite deals 25% increased damage and Chaos Explosions ignite enemies hit.

arcane_animator.name: Arcane Animator
arcane_animator.description: 16% chance to summon a Skeleton Mage when a Condemned target perishes and minions deal 12% bonus damage.

spiritual_infusion.name: Spiritual Infusion
spiritual_infusion.description: Increases Healing Received by 12% and deal 8% increased spell damage to Weakened enemies.

cold_soul.name: Cold Soul
cold_soul.description: Increases Spell Critical Power by 8% and deal 8% increased damage to Chilled and Frozen enemies.

lightning_fast_strikes.name: Storm Fast Strikes
lightning_fast_strikes.description: Increases Primary Attack Speed by 7% and Static triggers deals 20% increased damage.

sanguine_mastery.name: Sanguine Mastery
sanguine_mastery.description: Deal 8% increased physical damage to enemies affected by Leech and boost the effect of your current blood type by 8%.

renewing_flames.name: Renewing Flames
renewing_flames.description: Deal 8% increased spell damage to enemies affected by Ignite and Ignite heals you for up to 25% of your spell power.

soul_drinker.name: Soul Drinker
soul_drinker.description: Increases Feed Cooldown Rate by 24% and using Bite summons a Skeleton Warrior.

flowing_sorcery.name: Flowing Sorcery
flowing_sorcery.description: Increases Spell Cooldown Rate by 7% and there is a 35% chance to not consume Phantasm when triggering a cooldown reset.

chill_weave.name: Chill Weave
chill_weave.description: Shields absorb 10% additional damage. Breaking Freeze with a damaging attack triggers a frost nova dealing 40% magic damage and inflicting Chill.

enhanced_conductivity.name: Enhanced Conductivity
enhanced_conductivity.description: Increases Bonus Spell Power by 7% and spell damage now also triggers bonus damage to enemies affected by Static.

hunger_for_blood.name: Hunger For Blood
hunger_for_blood.description: Increases Primary Attack Leech by 5% and increases damage against V Bloods by 8%.

overpower.name: Overpower
overpower.description: Increases Weapon Cooldown Rate by 7% and Weapon Charge Gain by 6.

lethal_strikes.name: Lethal Strikes
lethal_strikes.description: Increases Physical Critical Power by 8% and deal 12% increased Physical Damage to enemies below 30% health.

feral_haste.name: Feral Haste
feral_haste.description: Increases Movement Speed by 4% and Movement Speed while shapeshifted by 15%.

bastion.name: Bastion
bastion.description: Increases Maximum Health by 8% and reduces damage taken by 25% when affected by a crowd control effect.

hunger_for_power.name: Hunger For Power
hunger_for_power.description: Increases Spell Leech by 5% and using Bite increases your movement speed by 15% and your spell power by 15% for 5s.

rampage.name: Rampage
rampage.description: Increases Physical Critical Chance by 8%. Physical Critical Strikes grants 12% increased Attack Speed for 4s.

ravenous_strikes.name: Ravenous Strikes
ravenous_strikes.description: Increases Weapon Skill Power by 8% and Weapon Skill Leech by 5%.

embrace_mayhem.name: Embrace Mayhem
embrace_mayhem.description: Increases Ultimate Cooldown Rate by 14% and Ultimate Power by 10%.

wicked_power.name: Wicked Power
wicked_power.description: Increases Spell Critical Chance by 8%. Spell Critical Strikes have a 50% chance to inflict a random spell school effect.

modifiers.stat: Chance to Inflict Random Spell Effect

dark_enchantment.name: Dark Enchantment
dark_enchantment.description: Increases Damage Reduction by 4% and triggers a shield absorbing 270% of your spell power for 4s when you take more than 30% of your maximum health in damage over the last 2s.

turbulent_velocity.name: Turbulent Velocity
turbulent_velocity.description: Increases Movement Speed by 4% and gain 4% additional movement speed for 4s when dealing damage to an enemy.
